31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported the Prophet (ﷺ) as saying:If a man emancipates his share in a slave, the rest will be emancipated by his money if he has enough money to pay the full price for him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ رَوَى أَنَّهُ، لاَ يَسْتَسْعِي
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Whoever Reported That He Is Not Asked To Work
